headline: Eggplant Mixed Grill
name: Eggplant Mixed Grill
description: Marinated vegetables are grilled to perfection.
recipeIngredient: 1 (1 pound) eggplant, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds
1 red bell pepper, cut into wedges
1 yellow bell pepper, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: In a large resealable plastic bag, mix the olive oil, parsley, oregano, basil, vinegar, kosher salt, pepper, and garlic. Place the onion, asparagus, mushrooms, eggplant, red bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper into the bag. Seal, and marinate 2 hours in the refrigerator, turning occasionally
Preheat the grill for high heat.
Lightly oil the grill grate. Grill the vegetables 6 minutes on each side, until tender.
